entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:13 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -41.1°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 62 %

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 44.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 44. Wind chill near minus 59. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 7:20 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 33.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 33. Wind chill minus 53 in the morning and minus 43 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 7:20 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 43 in the evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 7:20 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
